scripts.postinstall: gulp install-core && gulp install-server && gulp install-client
scripts.test: npm --prefix Client test && npm --prefix Server test
scripts.check-updates: npm run ncu && npm run ncu --prefix Core && npm run ncu --prefix Server && npm run ncu --prefix Client
scripts.install-updates: npm run ncu -- -u && npm run ncu --prefix Core -- -u && npm run ncu --prefix Server -- -u && npm run ncu --prefix Client -- -u && npm install
